specifications.Finish: Chemical > PU Coated (front) PU coated refers to a thin layer of polyurethane applied to the fabricâ€™s front side. This coating provides water resistance, enhances durability, creates a smooth surface texture, and offers some resistance to stains and wind. Decoration > Foil Foil treatment, applied through print, finish, or coating techniques, adds metallic graphics or patterns to the fabric. It creates a shimmering, reflective effect.
specifications.Care Advice: Chemical > PU Coated (front) There may be differences across batches of PU-coated fabrics due to variances in the color, thickness, and application of the coating. When storing the fabric, roll it up instead of folding it to prevent damage to the coated area. Decoration > Foil This fabric is delicate and susceptible to damage from rubbing or impact. Please handle it with care.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Flat dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Do not dry clean Recommended Use Windbreakers
